name: Forge 1.7.10 Dev
postCreateCommand: curl -s https://services.gradle.org/distributions/gradle-2.6-bin.zip -o gradle-4.9-bin.zip && unzip gradle-4.9-bin.zip -d /opt && rm gradle-4.9-bin.zip && echo 'export PATH=/opt/gradle-4.9/bin:$PATH' >> ~/.bashrc && ./gradlew setupDecompWorkspace --refresh-dependencies
